name: Karen-tastrophe
description:
Welcome to your store. After 5 long years of work, you were finally promoted to manager. Unluckily for you, your store seems to attract Karens, and they're OUT OF CONTROL. Succeed by eliminating all the Karens before they eat your staff and customers.

EDIT: Play the browser version, it's more stable. USE GOOGLE CHROME!

created for GMTK 2020 in 48 hours by 

henry liu, nidhir guggilla, kethan sivarapu, regina yu
